title: i18n Framework Setup
description: Install and configure react-i18next. Create namespace structure, extract all hardcoded strings into translation keys, and add language toggle.
acceptance_criteria: Namespace files: common.json, shopping.json, tasks.json, vouchers.json, settings.json for both en/ and he/
All hardcoded UI strings replaced with t() calls
Language toggle in Settings (English / Hebrew) persisted in localStorage
Language change applies without page reload
Context engine keywords have translation keys
Bubble labels and starter pack items have translation keys
files_to_touch: src/i18n/he/*.json (create namespace files with empty/placeholder values)
All component files (replace hardcoded strings with t() calls)
notes: Start with English translations (copy current strings). Hebrew translations come in fe-006. This task is about infrastructure, not translation quality.
